title: Mouchido, Watashi ni Koi Sasete! - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Heroes   Oneshot   Returning from Another World   Transported to Another World   Unrequited Love
author: かわた
description: I who was confessing to my childhood friend a certain day was turned down and suddenly got summoned to a different world. When I returned, my passion had completely disappeared…>
